benefits.FullSupportDescription: Questions? We’d love to hear from you!

why.LightweightDescription: Hardshell made of lightweight and resistant Polypropylene
why.MultipleSizesDescription: The set includes suitcases of different sizes, suitable for a variety of occasions
why.SecureDescription: Built-in TSA lock for extra safety
why.StretchableDescription: Signature lined interior with dividing panel, practical pockets and tightening
why.RemovalbleWheelsDescription: 360-degree detachable wheels ensure smooth maneuverability on various surfaces
why.QualityDescription: Made from high-quality materials, Titou suitcases are resistant to bumps, scratches and daily wear and tear.

newsletter.subscribe: Sign up and recieve exclusive offers, special deals and upcoming collections.

footer.description: Titou is a brand that has been producing polypropylene suitcases since 2018. Our brand combines resistance, practicality and design and offers a set of three suitcases in different colors.

aboutTitou.loveDoDescription: We are proud to offer you a wide selection of premium quality suitcases for all your travel needs. Whether you're looking for a hard-shell suitcase for family vacations or a soft one for business trips, we have what you need. All our suitcases are made from durable materials and built to last. They are equipped with sturdy zippers, comfortable handles, and smooth wheels for easy transportation.
aboutTitou.companystart: We take pride in offering you a wide selection of premium quality suitcases to meet all your travel needs. Whether you're looking for a hard-shell suitcase for family vacations or a sleek option for business trips, we've got you covered. All our suitcases are crafted with durable materials and designed to last. They come equipped with the latest innovations available at affordable prices, providing the ruggedness you can rely on in case of theft or loss of luggage. That's why we provide expert advice and reviews to help you find the suitcase that best suits your needs. So, what are you waiting for to embark on your next adventure with a high-quality suitcase that will last as long as you need it? Find the perfect suitcase for your next journey!
aboutTitou.missiondescription: Delivering an exceptional travel experience by providing top-quality suitcase compartments at low prices while preserving efficiency and style.

ContactUs.Title: Proudly Designed in Tunisia, Now Expanding Globally
ContactUs.Description1: With impeccable design standards and careful material selection, we offer a diverse range of choices for any journey.Our aim is to make traveling effortless, and we achieve this with our variety of even lighter cases, making a vast difference to all kinds of journeys. You can travel confidently with Titou cases, whether you are walking through an airport, boarding a ship or plane, or traveling by car or train.
ContactUs.Description2: We adhere to the highest quality standards, subjecting all raw materials and manufacturing processes to quality controls before production. We test every developed product in our lab and test centers, ensuring high levels of product control on all components.
ContactUs.Description3: We design, manufacture, and extensively test our products to withstand modern-day travel rigors. Our products go through overpass or steps tests and are subject to stringent quality controls. At Titou, we are committed to providing exceptional products that make your journey effortless and enjoyable.

Product.Description1: Discover Titou's Shine Collection hardside luggage, expertly crafted from a durable blend of polypropylene. These cases feature removable wheels, telescopic handles, TSA locks, and well-organized interiors, designed to meet all your travel needs.
Product.Description2: Lightweight 4 x multi-direction double wheels For more stability and better performance, 360° rotatin
Product.Description3: TSA INTEGRATED SECURE FLAT COMBI LOCK.
Product.Description5: INTERIOR with double-sided packing system & garment section
Product.ReturnDescription: All items can be returned within 30 days of receiving your order.

ProductList.subtitlefix: Discover our exclusive set of 3 suitcases with fixed wheels, the ultimate travel companion for those seeking both functionality and elegance. Each suitcase in this set is meticulously designed to provide a hassle-free travel experience.
ProductList.subtitleRemove: Discover our exclusive set of 3 suitcases with removable wheels, the ultimate travel companion for those seeking both functionality and elegance. Each suitcase in this set is meticulously designed to provide a hassle-free travel experience.
